Articles.Content:
UPDATED TO 0.90 see new thread here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103298-0-90-Working-Multiple-Star-Systems%28WITH-PLANETS%21%29?p=1604011#post1604011

Combining the wonderful work or Kragathea, Dooz and OvenProofMars, this mod adds two more stars with their own planetary systems to the game, and a black hole! I have tweaked them to work together into a huge expansion of the kerbal universe

Finally a reason to use interstellar drives(though conventional rockets work too, if you don't mind a 60 year transit)

Album(22 images)http://imgur.com/a/RIeSj

I'd call it semi-Stable, it works, there are bugs(minor imo, i have been playing with it without any game breaking stuff, but please, use quicksaves), i have no plans on fixing them, as i'm a mom with 2 kids, so time is a premium, and i have next to zero programming knowledge, so i wouldn't know where to start.

Future plans

-port over to Kopernicus when it's done

-make sure it works with 0.90

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1. Install Active textrue management{link below}

2. (optional) install EVE(link below)

3. Drag the GameData folder from the mod into your KSP root folder, replace any conflicts.

4. On start up, make sure that both the Kaiser Sytsem and the Sentar System are checked or their planets will not load.

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Contains the work of Kragathea for Planet Factory Creator Edition: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65401-WIP-PlanetFactory-CE

Dooz's Kaiser system: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77711-23-Dooz-s-Kaiser-System-Planet-Pack-For-PF-CE

and OvenProofMars for the Multiple Star Systems: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86999-0-24-StarSystems-v0-2

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

MASSIVE in RAM usage, use with ATM 4.0. Seriously, if you sneeze on this without ATM, you will crash.

ATM IS REQUIRED. Find it here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/59005-0-25-Release-4-2-Dec-10-2014-Active-Texture-Management-Save-RAM!

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

contains files for use with Environmental Enhancement, if you want EVE installed install it FIRST

EVE is not required, but reccomended: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Licence is pretty open, Krag's stuff is GPL, and the Kaiser System and the Multiple solar system stuff is CC-BY-SA-NC

the Planet Factory .cfgs are my edits, and follow the same CC-BY-SA-NC

___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Support

I'm a mom with 2 kids, and far from a programmer. I can help with install issues(maybe) but when it comes to code, i barely know what i did in the first place. if you find a way to make it more stable, then that's great!, let me know, i'll implement changes and credit your work!

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

DOWNLOAD

Curse: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/226201-working-multiple-star-systems

KerbalStuff: [Defunct link removed by a moderator]

what do the stars look like from the surface of the planets?

i'll grab some screens. it'll be later though. they do work for solar panels though!

No pics, no clicks, mate.

Otherwise I'd love to see how this turns out. I've refrained from installing StarSystems, PF, etc because I haven't been able to find a completed planet pack. Now that this is up and I see some pictures I'll be exploring in an interstellar fashion!

If you're interested in "finished" planets then the only mod I have found that does a good job is the original planetfactory mod. The sentar system is rather well done with the planets all seeming to have had a lot of work on them to make them have interesting terrain. That's really the key, Terrain. All the planet packs I'v tried lacked in that area. They look cool from space but the moment you go to land on them they quickly let you down, with terrain either so pronounced that it's just weird looking, or the planet basically has no contours at all and it almost seems to be a perfect sphere.

That being said I don't really blame the creators too much, we just haven't had a mod come out yet that allows planets to be made with the quality of the stock planets. I had hoped Kopernicus was going to help that situation but it hasn't had any commits to it's github in nearly a month unfortunately.

This includes Sentar though reworked.

And only one not bad planet pack. I too am waiting on kopernicus, but this still isn't half bad
